Rail Budget aspires for better service, speed & safety. It is an effort to create a modern Railways contributing towards a developed India.
Congratulations to the Railway Minister for presenting a futuristic & growth oriented budget. It is a budget for the common people.
Let us devote ourselves to fulfilling Dr. Syama Prasad Mookerjee's ideals. Will go to Parliament shortly to offer tributes to Dr. Mookerjee.
If there was something that mattered most to Dr. Mookerjee it was serving the people. He always spoke about education for the youth.
Tributes to our inspiration, Dr. Syama Prasad Mookerjee on his birth anniversary. His contribution to our Nation is invaluable.
The projects inaugurated today will give J&K both Gati (speed) & Urja (Energy) & this will go a long way in the state's development.
This hydropower project will benefit J&K's economy & at the same time will strengthen our resolve to free India from darkness.
During my J&K visit I dedicated 240 MW Uri-II hydropower project to the nation. This project was conceived during Atal ji's Govt.
Swami Vivekananda conquered the entire world with his life & message. Best tribute to him would be to imbibe his ideals in our daily lives.
I bow to Swami Vivekananda on his Nirvan Diwas. His thoughts & ideals remain an inspiration for everyone devoted to serving our nation.
Independence Day greetings to the people of USA. I envision a bright future for India-USA relations that will benefit both our nations.
Talked about self-reliance in defence manufacturing & our commitment to modernising our defence forces  http://pmindia.nic.in/details127.phpÂ
Addressed Army Jawans in Srinagar. Their courage, valour & sacrifice is an inspiration for every Indian & fills our hearts with pride!
Paying homage at Martyrs' Memorial at Badami Bagh cantonment in Srinagar pic.twitter.com/xEZDOvIAqF
We dream of a peaceful & prosperous J&K. Atal ji began the journey & we will take it ahead. Through development we will win people's hearts.

Felt blessed to dedicate Shri Mata Vaishno Devi Katra-Udhampur railway line to the Nation. Flagged off the 1st train from Katra to Udhampur.
Greetings to the people of Canada on Canada Day. India values our strong relation with Canada & we hope to strengthen the same in future.
Welcoming @RashtrapatiBhvn to Twitter! Will be a wonderful medium for the people to connect with the President & his office.
A replug of my speech to young CA students last year in Ahmedabad  http://nm4.in/155PA4LÂ
I congratulate my CA friends on Chartered Accountants Day & convey my best wishes. They have a crucial role to play in India's progress.
Health assurance & preventive healthcare are the way ahead. Sharing a recent speech when I addressed doctors http://nm4.in/19ELshFÂ
On Doctor's Day I salute the efforts of the doctor community & wish them the very best in their efforts to create a healthy India.
We have achieved a lot & we have to go a long way. Continued progress in space must remain our national mission!Â  http://nm4.in/1q7LvroÂ
Our space programme has overcome many Â hurdles. At the same time it is one of the most cost effective programmes. This should make us proud.
Extremely glad to have witnessed the successful launch of PSLV-C23. I congratulate our scientists who have worked tirelessly for the launch.
As Ramzan begins, I convey my greetings & pray that the Holy Month brings peace & happiness in everyone's life.
Our Government is committed to give further impetus to our Space Programme  http://nm4.in/1rLRgdrÂ
Will be in Sriharikota this evening & tomorrow morning for launch of PSLV-C23. Will meet scientists during my visit. Looking forward.
My greetings on Ashadhi Bij, the Kutchi New Year. I pray for a year filled with joy & happiness.
As Gujarat CM I had the honour to perform the Pahind Vidhi ritual during the Yatra in Ahmedabad. It is an experience I really cherished.
We pray to Lord Jagannath for peace, prosperity & happiness in India. May Lord Jagannath bless us with good monsoon that will help farmers.
We bow to Lord Jagannath on this auspicious day. Today once again he sets out on his chariot, giving blessings to the people.
My warm greetings to the people on the occasion of the Rath Yatras that would be held across India today.
I have spoken to the Petroleum Minister, Cabinet Secretary & GAIL Chairman and asked them to ensure immediate relief at the accident site.
My thoughts with the families of those who lost their lives in the GAIL Pipeline fire in AP. Prayers with the injured.
I look forward to improving relations with Bangladesh & have invited PM Sheikh Hasina to visit India http://nm4.in/VqLlAjÂ
I thanked PM Sheikh Hasina for her good wishes & emphasised on the strong historical & cultural ties between India & Bangladesh.
External Affairs Minister @SushmaSwaraj, who is visiting Bangladesh gave my letter to PM Sheikh Hasina during their meeting today.
As NDA Govt. completes a month, sharing some thoughts in my Blog http://nm4.in/1qKDFoYÂ
Had fruitful meetings with CMs & detailed presentations with Ministers & Officials. Together we will take India to greater heights.
Due to people's affection, collective experience of Ministerial colleagues & support from officials my confidence level rose tremendously.
Our Government completes a month in office. A big thanks to the people for their support & affection that keeps inspiring us to work harder.
Congratulated Rajesh Kumar, son of a PMO staff member, on clearing civil services exam. A proud accomplishment! pic.twitter.com/wLlDEe4FQ7
More good news! Great Himalayan National Park is a @UNESCO World Heritage Site. Do plan your next trip here  http://www.greathimalayannationalpark.comÂ
On his Punya Tithi I bow to Dr. Syama Prasad Mookerjee. He spent his life in service of the Nation. His thoughts & ideals inspire us greatly
I have several memories with Raman Bhai. Spent a lot of time with him. He was truly an inspiring personality, devoted to social work.
Sad to hear about the demise of Shri Ramanbhai Shah of Ahmedabad. My condolences to his family. May his soul rest in peace.
Next time you visit Gujarat, you must visit Rani Ki Vav, an excellent symbol of our great art & culture  http://www.gujarattourism.com/showpage.aspx?contentid=148&webpartid=415&lang=EnglishÂ â€¦
Rani Ki Vav in Patan, Gujarat has been added to the UNESCO #WorldHeritage list! A matter of great pride for us.
Congrats to all those who successfully cleared IIT-JEE. My best wishes with the youngsters as they enter a new phase of their lives.
Shri Shrenik Lalbhai left a distinguished mark through his service to society. May his soul rest in peace. Offered condolences to his family

India plans to create an e-library network in Bhutan & we would double scholarships being given to students of Bhutan.
Was happy to know about the large allocation for education in Bhutan's last budget. It shows commitment to well-being of future generations!
In a short span of time, Bhutan has developed immense faith in democratic institutions. This is wonderful for Bhutan's development journey.
Addressed Bhutan's Parliament. When Bhutan moves ahead, India too feels like taking steps ahead to support Bhutan http://nm4.in/1kXqTjQÂ
Back to Delhi. This Bhutan trip will remain etched in my memory. It was a very satisfying & productive visit pic.twitter.com/hFWpesyqZb
Here are some pictures of a memorable welcome I received in Bhutan  http://nm4.in/1utSQR1Â
I had fruitful discussions with His Majesty the King & PM @tsheringtobgay on various issues. Looking forward to working with them in future.
I foresee a glorious chapter in history of Bhutan-India relations. We should increase co-operation not just in economy but in every sphere.
World talks GDP but in Bhutan its about National Happiness. Am sure having India as a neighbour would be 1 of the reasons for the happiness.
I described India-Bhutan relations as B4B; Bharat for Bhutan and Bhutan for Bharat. We stand committed to each other's progress & happiness.
Greetings from Bhutan! Had an excellent first day in Bhutan. Overwhelmed by the warmth & hospitality of the people here.
I travel to Bhutan with immense happiness & a strong desire to further strengthen our already strong bond http://nm4.in/1selGJqÂ
I would have the honour of addressing the Joint Session of the Parliament of Bhutan & inaugurate the building of Bhutan's Supreme Court.
Bhutan & India share a very special relationship that has stood the test of time. Thus, Bhutan was a natural choice for my 1st visit abroad.
Looking forward to visiting Bhutan. I will hold detailed discussions with His Majesty the King & His Majesty the Fourth King & PM of Bhutan.
Told Karyakartas that we should create an Organisation where every person feels- yes there is a place for me here. That will be our success.
Time has come to take tough decisions in the interest of the nation. Whatever decisions we take will be solely guided by national interest.
Also addressed Goa BJP Karyakartas. Assured them that there is a Government in Delhi that they will be very proud of!
Thank you Goa for the warm welcome. Glad that I made my first official visit outside Delhi to Goa & that too to dedicate INS Vikramaditya.
Today we reaffirm our pledge to raise greater awareness about the importance of blood donation. My young friends should take a lead in this.
On World Blood Donor Day I congratulate every one who keeps donating blood. It is a great service to society.
We dream of an India that is self-sufficient in producing defence equipment using the latest technology.
Addition of INS Vikramaditya will add tremendous might to our Navy. I congratulate all officials of the Indian Navy on this historic day.
Feel extremely delighted to have dedicated INS Vikramaditya to the Nation. This is a proud moment for the people of India & our Armed Forces
We discussed how innovative ideas like 'lab to land' approach can strengthen agriculture & help our farmers pic.twitter.com/T7Jl5GJb8x
Had a fruitful discussion on agriculture, rural economy, organic farming, soil health & other agri-related issues with Ministers & officials
Sports brings a spirit of togetherness. Am sure FIFA World Cup will become a bridge to connect nations of the world  http://nm4.in/TO9qA3Â
Football has emerged as a very popular sport among the youth & am sure youngsters will be following the World Cup with great enthusiasm.
As the 2014 FIFA World Cup begins, released commemorative postage stamps pic.twitter.com/yJefjVAl7D
Congrats to my young friends who successfully cleared Civil Services Exam. I wish them a bright & fruitful career in service of the nation.
I have written to President Putin & Prime Minister Medvedev, conveying greetings on the occasion of Russia's National Day.
My greetings to the people of Russia on Russia's National Day.  India values the long standing & strong bond with Russia.
Told young officers to present India's full trade & commerce potential to the world so that our exports get a boost  http://nm4.in/1l3EZkEÂ
Wished my young friends the very best as they go to represent India globally. Also urged them to strengthen relations with the diaspora.
Had a great exchange of ideas with probationers of 2012 IFS Batch. Encouraging to see this batch having largest number of lady probationers.

Time has come to show India's strength to the world. Lets recognise our demographic dividend & present image of a Skilled India to the world
Friends from various Parties presented their views in both Houses. I thank them for their suggestions. Together we all will take India ahead

Today was my 1st address in the Lok Sabha & Rajya Sabha. I spoke on the Motion of Thanks on the President's Address.

Infrastructure should not only be about Highways but also about Information Highways! The way ahead lies in creating optical fibre networks.
The need of the hour is to think big. The more we focus on skill, scale & speed, it will increase India's growth trajectory.
